4637.verse: وَٱلْأَرْضَ|And the earth,|117|135|2280$مَدَدْنَـٰهَا|We have spread it out|168|204|9735$وَأَلْقَيْنَا|and cast|79|114|5113$فِيهَا|therein|66|102|253$رَوَٲسِىَ|firmly set mountains|153|171|9319$وَأَنۢبَتْنَا|and We made to grow|166|186|9736$فِيهَا|therein|66|105|253$مِن|of|50|89|53$كُلِّ|every|57|96|185$زَوْجِۭ|kind|68|107|3841$بَهِيجٍ|beautiful,|82|102|11983$

4639.verse: وَنَزَّلْنَا|And We have sent down|182|192|10105$مِنَ|from|50|69|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|103|157$مَآءً|water|58|77|202$مُّبَـٰرَكًا|blessed,|84|103|3106$فَأَنۢبَتْنَا|then We made to grow|172|182|13256$بِهِۦ|thereby|71|124|204$جَنَّـٰتٍ|gardens|75|182|241$وَحَبَّ|and grain|81|188|16039$ٱلْحَصِيدِ|(for) the harvest,|137|190|16040$

4641.verse: رِّزْقًا|A provision|92|99|206$لِّلْعِبَادِ‌ۖ|for the slaves,|116|130|15143$وَأَحْيَيْنَا|and We give life|126|140|16044$بِهِۦ|therewith|83|97|204$بَلْدَةً|(to) a land|91|105|12798$مَّيْتًا‌ۚ|dead.|57|71|5996$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|84|702$ٱلْخُرُوجُ|(will be) the coming forth.|193|193|16045$

4644.verse: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ|And (the) companions|166|176|12126$ٱلْأَيْكَةِ|(of) the wood|112|133|9828$وَقَوْمُ|and (the) people|131|152|12125$تُبَّعٍ‌ۚ|(of) Tubba.|96|117|15603$كُلٌّ|All|49|70|1081$كَذَّبَ|denied|67|77|5487$ٱلرُّسُلَ|the Messengers,|129|213|5330$فَحَقَّ|so was fulfilled|117|285|10278$وَعِيدِ|My Threat.|93|177|9557$

4632.verse: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

4633.verse: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."

4634.verse: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

4635.verse: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

4636.verse: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

4637.verse: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

4638.verse: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].

4639.verse: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

4640.verse: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

4641.verse: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.

4642.verse: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

4643.verse: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

4644.verse: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

4645.verse: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.
